name: Elon VS Jeff
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2020

Elon and Jeff are competing for the domain of the internet satellites industry. Help your favorite super villain to repair his sats in order to become the world's hero. Push A on your joystick to repair a sat once you are close to it and use the left analog to turn your direction. Remember that in space you can't stop moving. Let the conquest of the earth begin!

CHIVITO GAMES
